alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Inland Franklin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 8:28AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Franklin County through 915 AM EDT... At 828 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Carrabelle, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Eastpoint, Franklin, Carrabelle Beach, Morgan Place, Royal Bluff, High Bluff, Yent Place and Green Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
